name: WireGuard Service
description: Ensures WireGuard VPN interface is up; skips if not present.
check_cmd: if command -v wg >/dev/null; then wg show 2>/dev/null | grep -q interface && echo active || echo inactive; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart wg-quick@wg0 || true; fi
